titles.title: Tribal Development Corporation Feasibility Study Act of 2005
Tribal Development Corporation Feasibility Study Act of 2005
To amend the Native American Business Development, Trade Promotion, and Tourism Act of 2000 to establish the Tribal Development Corporation Feasibility Study Group.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-626.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 366.

bill.summary: 9/6/2006--Reported to House without amendment. Tribal Development Corporation Feasibility Study Act of 2005 - Amends the Native American Business Development, Trade Promotion, and Tourism Act of 2000 to direct the Secretary of Commerce to establish the Tribal Development Corporation Feasibility Study Group to study and report to Congress on the feasibility of establishing an Indian Tribal Development Corporation.
